forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

threads.latestCommentText: hi! as of version 184.2 (you're on [version]), quest 2 hooked up via steam should now be detected as quest! thx ferny!

threads.title: Change Desktop body height!
threads.latestCommentText: And Update 182.6: We fixed a crash issue when increasing your height while on certain big grounds, like at Fazzi's Home!

threads.title: Video updates
threads.latestCommentText: Hope you enjoy!

threads.title: Fix for Desktop i key
threads.latestCommentText: Before, it opened the inventory even while you were entering something into the virtual keyboard, that's properly prevented now!

threads.title: Expanded Desktop editing!
threads.latestCommentText: awesome! better desktop mode seems like it would open the game up to lots of new players!

threads.title: Friday Update for the Special Price of $0.00!
threads.latestCommentText: Thanks everyone who supports us, even $1/ month is appreciated!

threads.title: small change for hand replacements
threads.latestCommentText: this is meant so newcomers can get to know the default hands first and don't as easily run into usability issues some hands may cause.

threads.title: desktop mode zoom!
threads.latestCommentText: (I understand this would be nice to have as option in VR too!) Hope you enjoy!

threads.title: Smoother desktop movement!
threads.latestCommentText: You can toggle this setting back to the old style -- or make it even stronger -- by clicking on the Camera icon in the Me dialog and toggling the options. Hope you enjoy!

threads.latestCommentText: some videos still work fine for me but yeah the last time i tried using a monitized video i got a 1 hour unskippable add.

threads.title: Desktop mode grabbing improvement
threads.latestCommentText: We moved the VR hardware info to the back of the Me -> "..." dialog, so that you can now see it in both desktop mode and VR mode!

threads.latestCommentText: it would be cool if we could have this as an official feature, without needing to rely on the somewhat-unreliable (and unintuitive) method of using 'most collected things'.

threads.title: Build Animation improvements & more
threads.latestCommentText: And Update 171.11: Sub-Thing parts are now also included in Build Animations (albeit their merged variants, unless merging is disabled in the Me settings)!

threads.title: Build Animations!

threads.title: New: Dynamic Hands!

threads.title: area json export
threads.latestCommentText: And v165.12: When exporting an area, all Thing Jsons are now exported as well into a folder (if you created them or they are clonable)! Thx Liza!

threads.title: Extra Mirrors!
threads.latestCommentText: just that i thought the apple was funny, part of it was the "need" to restart :p

threads.title: More Anti-Lag Tools
threads.latestCommentText: There's plans for auto-curbing of parts with very high msg counts, but as I'll be on vacation from April 17-28, we wanna wait with things that need further post-release tuning :)

threads.title: More Lag Info
threads.latestCommentText: We want to look further into auto-capping high amounts of messages, but hopefully this new stats info gives you some more insight into possible area lag.

threads.title: Dr. Update or How I learned to Love version 165.5
threads.latestCommentText: thx, will look into it!

threads.title: Thunderday III: Strike Force Eagle
threads.latestCommentText: And update 165.4: There's the new body tell, "When told by body both hands triggered then"!

threads.title: legs video!
threads.latestCommentText: thanks everyone! [youtube: xAN1mWBcCWE]

threads.title: Leg Tuning & Fixes!
threads.latestCommentText: ~~ Interlude ~~ As my web ads income which keeps my dev life alive continues to shrink, you can help out with pledging a monthly amount, from small to big, at Patreon.com/anyland!

threads.title: Legs!
threads.latestCommentText: Update 164: We fixed how legs are rotated if you already rotated the sphere for a bit... it should now be much more intuitive in those cases! Thx Zid, Sloppy & all!

threads.title: Patreon Thanks!
threads.latestCommentText: Update: All patreons are now also shown at anyland.com !

threads.title: Monday Update: Our Writers Are Still Coming Up With a Codename
threads.latestCommentText: And Update 160.25: The ring glow is now smoothly transitioning when changing "Change Things" mode (and is also visible while e.g. editing) to give better visibility to its meaning!

threads.title: Friday the 5th: Update Camp Crystal Lake
threads.latestCommentText: Also, we fixed an issue where if you dragged an attachment into a comment but then cancel it, it would still be posted into your next comment that session!

threads.title: Optimized Area Buttons
threads.latestCommentText: (To paste an Anyland boards comment image, just use a Steam screenshot or artwork, right-click it and copy its url. Then hit Ctrl+V while typing a comment.)

threads.title: Have Webpage emit item
threads.latestCommentText: hope it's useful!

threads.title: Optimization Checklist
threads.latestCommentText: It's also linked from the bottom of the main guide which opens when you click the main dialog's (i)

threads.title: Thunderday II: Rise of the Updates
threads.latestCommentText: ... If you've ever found yourself using that dialog's search function to find someone, but they didn't appear because you had too many friends, please try again now.

threads.title: Gif Optimizer
threads.latestCommentText: And Update 160.8: The last page of base shapes had a cube overlay the first shape for a while, that's fixed now! Thx Gold & Zid!

threads.title: Desktop Mode quality upbump
threads.latestCommentText: Feedback as always welcome! Hope you enjoy!

threads.title: "Show at ...m distance"
threads.latestCommentText: Update: Your "Show at" values will now also be considered when copy & pasting a whole area! (This is a server-side update, so no new client needs to be downloaded.)

threads.title: Itsame, Updatio!
threads.latestCommentText: ... Click "Enabled" on the backside of the placement context dialog, and untick "Show if far away"! (Note unticking this for placed sub-thing movers may cause out-of-sync issues.)

threads.title: Setting Things via Webpage, and working Camera Filters
threads.latestCommentText: maybe make it so you can embed links in the boards

threads.title: Settings Reference
threads.latestCommentText: It's also linked from the Guide you see when clicking (i) on the main dialog. Hope it's useful!

threads.title: Thunderday Update
threads.latestCommentText: And Update 159.5: The "Personal Experience" setting is now also available in the Thing -> More settings (not just the Thing Part More settings)! Thx Gio!

threads.title: "Sun omits shadow" + better shadow limits
threads.latestCommentText: sirdesh that's interesting -- maybe we need to ensure that generally particles don't cast shadows, if that's not already this way. da, also great feedback!

threads.title: Light Limits probing & fps display
threads.latestCommentText: ... though my tests were in an area where i was at  a down limit of constant45 fps to begin with, so might need more testing...

threads.title: 10 Shocking Reasons to Get This Update
threads.latestCommentText: Update 158.4: "Floats on Liquid" now only affects behavior towards placed Liquids (not thrown, emitted or held ones)! Thx Jinx!

threads.title: Loop Sounds Update!
threads.latestCommentText: When you now hit the preview (i) button on sounds, a possibly still playing previous preview sound is now stopped!

threads.title: scripting Reference!
threads.latestCommentText: You can also open this in VR by pressing (i) on the main dialog, and then scrolling down to & clicking on "Scripting Reference".

threads.title: Codename Superfast

threads.title: Fursday Fixes

threads.title: startup fix

threads.title: Video Player audio fix & more
threads.latestCommentText: There's new Area setting "Only editors use inventory"! With this mode, opening the inventory (as non-editor) shows a message that this is currently disallowed in the area.

threads.title: Transparent Bright Material & Face View command
threads.latestCommentText: (careful, "face view" creates a different thing rotation for each different person in the area.)
